resources.string: CREATE TABLE type_ligne (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, type_ligne VARCHAR NOT NULL);
CREATE TABLE lignes (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, nom VARCHAR NOT NULL, id_type_ligne INTEGER REFERENCES type_ligne(id));
CREATE TABLE terminus (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, id_ligne INTEGER REFERENCES lignes(id), terminus VARCHAR2 NOT NULL);
